parameters.name: Depth
parameters.description: The depth at which information about the node is queried. If you set Depth to 2, the information about the node and all its child nodes at the next layer is returned.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the pipeline node.

parameters.name: NodeId
parameters.description: The ID of the pipeline node. You can call [ListPipelineRuns](~~438042~~) to obtain the node ID.

parameters.name: Order
parameters.description:
The sorting order. This parameter must be used together with the SortBy parameter. Valid values:

*   DESC (default)
*   ASC

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page.

parameters.name: PipelineRunId
parameters.description: The ID of the pipeline job. You can call [ListPipelineRuns](~~438042~~) to obtain the ID of the pipeline job.

parameters.name: SortBy
parameters.description:
The field used to sort the returned results. The following fields are supported:

*   Name
*   Type
*   GmtCreateTime

parameters.name: TokenId
parameters.description: The ID of the shared pipeline job.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description:
The output type of the pipeline node.

*   Model
*   DataSet
*   Metrics
*   ModelEvaluation
